attributes.action: persuade germany to adopt the young polar bears in captivity to prevent their cruel death
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this week germany has polar bears in captivity which their mother has rejected her young.  germany says it is nature to allow the young polar bears to die.  i believe they should adopt the young polar bears and allow them to live, as it is not nature to hold animals in captivity. if it was natural, they would be in the wild, and at least have some chance to survive for themselves. humans should not interfiere with nature by holding animals in captivity, this is cruelty.
